title: Chasing the Muse
lyrics:
One part anger
Two parts heartbreak
Three parts relief
I'm escaping this reality we made
Four parts fear
I've made a terrible mistake but

Only a fool would stay



Got what I paid for

I was chasing the muse

You're gonna get what you paid for

It's time you walked away from me

It's time to choose

How to be

And what to do

How are you gonna be?

What are you gonna do?

I hope you figure it out



So put the record

Put the record on its needle

Go on and turn the TV down

And try to listen

I will listen if I'm able

What was that song about



'Cause how much longer were we carrying on

How many more times would we carry you home

The bar was closing down

You were stumbling out

Sleepwalking drunk

And I only mirrored the pain



Got what I paid for

I was chasing the muse

You're gonna get what you paid for

It's time you walked away from me

It's time to choose

How to be

And what to do

How are you gonna be?

What are you gonna do?

I hope you figure it out



So put the record

Put the record on its needle

Go on and turn the TV down

And try to listen

I will listen if I'm able

What was that song about





Got what I paid for

I was chasing the muse

You're gonna get what you paid for

It's time you walked away from me

It's time to choose

How to be

And what to do

How are you gonna be?

What are you gonna do?

I hope you figure it out



I hope you figure it out

'Cause how much longer were we carrying on?

I hope you'll figure it out

How many more times would we carry you home?

You're gonna figure it out

How much longer were we carrying on?

You're gonna figure it out

How many more times, let love carry you home?
